name: Ahmed Baba
content:
#Blackkklansman was incredible

An essential piece of art

I won’t spoil anything so I’ll just say when it ended, the theater was dead silent & then erupted in applause

Not only a necessary rebuke of  white supremacy but an important spotlight on the dichotomy of black identity

name: Jay Washington
content: #BlackkKlansman grabs you from the opening scene and doesnt let go until the credits. It is a powerful film & reminder of how history is slowly repeating itself and we have to fight ignorance & intolerance. My review is going up TONIGHT.

name: Jonny Moy
content: Go see #CrazyRichAsians. And #Blindspotting. And #BlacKkKlansman. Please understand one story won't capture an entire community's experience and keep up demand for more movies starring POC.

name: sean miura
content:
I’ve been seeing so many influential Black folks talking up #CrazyRichAsians and I hope that #AsianAmericanTwitter is continuing to show up for Black media this week as well!

To do the least, #BlacKkKlansman⁠ ⁠just opened and #InsecureHBO⁠⁠ just returned for a new season.

content: Weekend 2 of #BlacKkKlansman. Make sure to check it out if you haven’t seen it yet.  pic.twitter.com/xZYSuN3znQ

name: Molly Elizabeth
content: Man, the finale of #BlacKkKlansman was... wow. It was so silent in the theater, you could hear people breathing. You have to watch it... and then go register to vote. I’m begging you.

content: Saw #BlackkKlansman last night and the audience was SILENT at the end. Say what you will about Spike Lee, but it hit me when I realized how much his films have impacted my life and artistic worldview. 30 years old still catching his films on the big screen. Legend.

name: The All-Mighty Xilla Valentine
content: I must applaud @TopherGrace for the candor he showed with this answer. "That's a great question, I've never been accused to my face by anyone of being racist. content: Spike Lee made a new classic with #BlackKKlansman.

name: SheBreathes®
content: How odd that Boots Riley is attacking Spike Lee over a movie but then tacks on that he did an ad for the NYPD to help forge better relations between them and black folks. #Blackkklansman isn’t a perfect movie (it can’t cure all racism or explain it) but it’s not some conspiracy.

name: Yes, You're Racist
content: Don’t want to spoil anything, but seeing #BlackkKlansman on the one-year anniversary of Charlottesville was incredibly surreal. Undoubtedly one of the best movies of 2018 — go see it as soon as humanly possible.

name: Awesomely Luvvie
content: I saw #Blackkklansman on Friday in Chicago. I liked it. John David Washington is indeed his father's son. He is clearly a gifted actor. The story is almost so ridiculous that if it wasn't a true story, the Academy would probably label it a comedy.

name: dirty computer.
content: Just finish seeing #BlacKkKlansman and when I tell you you could hear a pin drop at the end of the movie... it was dead silent

name: Leonard Maltin
content: #SpikeLee is an audacious filmmaker who crosses boundaries and deliberately blurs drama and reality. Never has this been more effective than in #BlacKkKlansman --a great story, told with passion, period authenticity, and humor. Bravo, sir https://bit.ly/2OY4ndx  #MaltinOnMoviespic.twitter.com/KJ92hsOVjA

content:
Y’all really think he’s mad about players kneeling in a preseason game? He’s not. He loves the distraction.

What might upset him is if we make #BlacKkKlansman number one at the box office.  It’s a great movie, and he isn’t gonna like it.

content: Don’t usually do posts like this but couple weeks ago I attended a preview screening of the movie #BlacKkKlansman. It’s an incredibly moving true story that shares such an intense and important message - It’s out today in cinemas, and I think it’s something everyone needs to see

name: Mackenzie Thirkill
content:
I went to go see #Blackkklansman last night and was left speechless leaving the theatre. The film is every bit as great as you’ve heard, and powerful in more ways than one. Talk about timely, vital, uncompromising filmmaking. 

Bravo, Spike Lee. Bravo.

name: Adam Best
content: There's a moment in #BlacKkKlansman where Ron Stallworth, the protagonist, says we could never have a President like David Duke. It hits you like a ton of bricks because we now have something even worse: a President who thinks like Duke, only he camouflages it more effectively.

name: Sylvia K. Alston
content: #BlackkKlansman. We took our 13 year old son. The film is nuanced & filled w/ juxtaposition to present day. Seeing that film on the one year anniversary of Charlottesville- was indeed powerful. We couldn’t move when it ended. Could not move. Had to process it all. Powerful.

name: Cabbie Richards
content: Provocative, funny, uncomfortable, creepy with a powerful ending, @BlacKkKlansman from Spike Lee is GREAT. Though set in the 70s, it feels very contemporary. Standout performances from Jasper Paakkonen, Ashlie Atkinson & Laura Harrier. #BlacKkKlansman 4/4 pic.twitter.com/eBC2TIs0fv

name: Franklin Leonard
content: On the other hand, #BlackKKlansman does do a pretty good job of representing all black klansmen.

name: priscilla page
content: #BlacKkKlansman is satire, agitprop, blaxploitation homage, buddy-cop story, comedy & tragedy & horror, and a commentary on America (past & present) and the political power of film. instantly one of my favorite movies of the year & one of my favorite Spike Lee joints
